title: Jacob
description: Jacob Matheson is an author who appears to have it made. After winning a prestigious literary award, his perfect life starts to unravel as a series of unexplainable phenomenon start occurring in his home.When the lines between reality and fantasy start to blur and the rational gives way to the irrational, who can he trust when his own friends donâ€™t believe him?Even worse, how can trust himself when he starts to question his own sanity?
author: Mark D.  Campbell
